column2:
"Hello, <%me>.
Looking into something here on Amduskia,
are you?"

"Try as I might, the call is too strong for me to
ignore. The dragorii are simply too robust a
species. The allure is too great."

"Really, the only immediate drawback is Wright's incessant whining.
Speaking of, I would appreciate it if you didn't mention that you saw me here."

"On that note, I should be going. I wish you luck
with your investigation, whatever it is."

"やあ
<%me>くん。
キミもアムドゥスキアで調査かい？"

"やはりダメだ、抑えきれないよ。
この惑星の龍族……その重厚な生命は
魅力的すぎて、自重など出来ない。"

"とはいえ、ライト君にとやかく
言われるのも面倒なんでね。
私がここに居たことは黙っていてくれ。"

"では、私は行くとするよ。
キミの探索も上手くいくといいね。"
